revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cameo |model=WLG-2207 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/02/2005 |manuf_country= |manuf=Global Sun |manuf_model=GL2454RT-QA0 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NHPWLG2207 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2312A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV800BTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16400-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2312A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} "GL2454RT-QA0-B10" and "VER V1.0" is silkscreened on the board. :This is a '''Global Sun''' GL2454RT-QA0. '''Cameo''' merged with '''Global Sun''' in 2005.
This device shares the same board ID as the [[Planet WRT-410]], [[Airnet AWR014G8]], and [[D-Link DI-624 rev C2/C3]]. The [[AT&T Plug and Share 6800G]] also has a similar ID and near identical hardware.
One TRENDnet TEW-452BRP model (likely the first) is this router.
Default credentials are per the FCC manual. :The default SSID is likely '''default'''.
Notes:
- No firmware found
